SQLTableDDL: CREATE TABLE Student (sName VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL, sEmail VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL, sID INT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(sID));
CREATE TABLE StudentClass (cID INT NOT NULL, sID INT NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY(cID, sID));
CREATE TABLE Assignment (cID INT NOT NULL, sID INT NOT NULL, aName VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, aCategory VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL, score FLOAT, maxScore INT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(cID, sID, aName, aCategory));

CREATE TABLE Class (cID INT NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1),cName VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL, teacherName VARCHAR(30), semester VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, schoolName VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, cTime TIME NOT NULL, gsID INT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(cID));

CREATE TABLE GradingScale (gsID INTEGER NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1),A FLOAT NOT NULL, B FLOAT NOT NULL, C FLOAT NOT NULL, D FLOAT NOT NULL, F FLOAT NOT NULL, passFail BOOLEAN NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(gsID));
CREATE TABLE CategoryWeight (cwCategory VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL, weight FLOAT NOT NULL, gsID INT NOT NULL, PRIMARY Key(cwCategory, weight, gsID));
ALTER TABLE StudentClass ADD CONSTRAINT FK_StudentClass_Class FOREIGN KEY (cID) REFERENCES Class(cID);
ALTER TABLE StudentClass ADD CONSTRAINT FK_StudentClass_Student FOREIGN KEY (sID) REFERENCES Student(sID);
ALTER TABLE Assignment ADD CONSTRAINT FK_StudentClassAssignment FOREIGN KEY (cID, sID) REFERENCES StudentClass(cID, sID);
ALTER TABLE Assignment ADD CONSTRAINT FK_AssignmentClass FOREIGN KEY (cID) REFERENCES Class(cID);
ALTER TABLE Class ADD CONSTRAINT FK_ClassGradingScale FOREIGN KEY (gsID) REFERENCES GradingScale(gsID);
ALTER TABLE CategoryWeight ADD CONSTRAINT FK_GradingScaleCategoryWeight FOREIGN KEY (gsID) REFERENCES GradingScale(gsID);
